TF092337-TJ - EMERGENCY FOOD SECURITY
            AND SEED IMPORTS PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Emergency Food
            Security and Seed Imports Project for Tajikistan are: (i) to
            increase domestic food production and reduce the loss of
            livestock to help at least 55,000 poorest households; (ii)
            to improve the ability of poor households to deal with seed
            shortages due to poor crops; and (iii) to promote private
            commercial farming in order to increase food production and
            diversification. The changes include: (i) adding a new
            activity, a temporary revolving fund for fertilizer imports,
            to component E 'agro-input supply market
            development'; (ii) revision of the project's
            institutional arrangements, specifically for the project
            management unit to implement all activities under the
            project; and (iii) reallocation of funds in the amount of
            $1.815 million under the Russia food price crisis rapid
            response trust fund.  The changes are requested by the
            Government to provide additional support to component E in
            the face of unexpected events that constrain implementation
            of activities as originally planned.
